issue.title: www.mgnacg.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.mgnacg.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mgnacg.com%2F) ### Comment > 打开浏览器并开启AdGuard插件，首次进入该网站时，被截图的广告并未被拦截，手动标识后可被拦截，即使是退出网站后再次进入时拦截仍然有效。但是在关闭浏览器后一段时间再次进入该网站时会复现该问题。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/tfRby4x.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (),
Self-destructing third-party cookies (),
Block WebRTC,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.title: mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://mail.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.ru) ### Comment > Проблема возникает на любых сайтах, но только в браузере Mozilla Firefox при включении в AdGuard https фильтрации. С отключенной фильтрацией проблемы нет, но и фильтрации рекламы почти нет :( > Проблема появилась после перехода на Windows 11. Пока работал на Windows 10 все было отлично. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/xt9Os5U.png)
Screenshot 2 [Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/qcCJmTc.png)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180) DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://my.xfinity.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmy.xfinity.com%2F) ### Comment > This just started today. Xfinity homepage started black then it loaded. Now it shows this icon or pattern and when I move the page up it says this"Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information. > Privacy Policy | Cookie Preferences". Then when I move the page up farther it shows the homepage screen but their is no search browser. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> @RealGoldenGeneral Which filter causes it?

I went through each and everyone of my filters and I found that AdGuard base and Easylist both block the script required to show items in the shop. I also found out that the problem fixes itself when you refresh
